With star players LaMelo Ball, Brandon Miller and Miles Bridges, the Hornets are up against a Bucks line-up that includes Giannis Antetokounmpo, Bobby Portis and Brook Lopez.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model gives the Bucks a 60% chance of beating the Hornets at Spectrum Center.
